buginformation.summary: division zero wrongly throws jsc divide error
buginformation.description: what steps will reproduce the problem unaliased division zero what the expected output what you see instead expect minified code but error thrown instead what version the product are you using what operating system appspot please provide any additional information below division zero perfectly sane operation ecma script see the ecma script specification aliased division zero permitted http github com what way does this cause problem generally devision zero indicative programming error could make suppressible however infinity writable variable just like undefined for these cases both safer and faster generate the value rather than look for the scope chain because this and void are common idioms also think this dumb error and has never solved any real problem this issue was closed revision 900
